CustomField.description: We have a File Download / View Type picklist field in S3-File object. You can set the default value for that picklist field for all new files using this option. If "Private", only file owner, users with Modify All access on S3-File or users added in "Grantees" section will be able to view / download the file. If "Public" all users in your Salesforce org will be able to view / download files.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: We have a File Download / View Type picklist field in S3-File object. You can set the default value for that picklist field for all new files using this option. If "Private", only file owner, users with Modify All access on S3-File or users added in "Grantees" section will be able to view / download the file. If "Public" all users in your Salesforce org will be able to view / download files.
CustomField.label: Default File Download / View Type
